front.title: Developing trust frameworks to support identity federations

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: When supported by trust frameworks, identity federations provide a secure method for leveraging shared identity credentials across communities of similarly-focused online service providers. This document explores the concepts around trust frameworks and identity federations and provides topics to consider in their development and implementation.
